metadata.title: CVE-2020-25729 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
ZoneMinder before 1.34.21 has XSS via the connkey parameter to download.php or export.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-25729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.34.21-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.34.21-1ubuntu1').
